# ðŸŽ® **Pygame AI Tic-Tac-Toe - Release {VERSION}**

An AI-powered Tic-Tac-Toe game built with Python, PyGame and numpy featuring the minimax algorithm.

## ðŸ“¦ Downloads

### Windows (64-bit)
- `tictactoe-win-x64.zip` - Extract and run `tictactoe-game.exe`
- **Requirements:** Windows 10 or later

### Linux (64-bit)
- `tictactoe-linux-x64.tar.gz` - Extract and run `./run.sh`
- **Requirements:** Ubuntu 22.04+ / Debian 11+ / GLIBC 2.35+ or equivalent

## ðŸŽ¯ Features
- Play against intelligent AI opponent
- Minimax algorithm traversing all levels
- Clean, intuitive interface
- Valid move highlighting
- Automatic king promotion

## ðŸš€ Quick Start

**Windows:**
1. Download `tictactoe-win-x64.zip`
2. Extract the ZIP file
3. Double-click `tictactoe-game.exe`
4. Enjoy!

**Linux:**
```bash
# Download and extract
tar -xzf tictactoe-linux-x64.tar.gz
cd tictactoe-linux

# Run the game
./run.sh
# OR
./tictactoe-game
```

## ðŸ’» Running from Source
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/ADolbyB/pygame-ai-tictactoe.git
cd pygame-ai-tictactoe

# Install dependencies
pip install pygame==2.5.2 numpy

# Run the game
python tictactoe.py
```
